author: g11tech
content: I have gone through the EIP 2929, our expectation with the new EIP would be to mandate clients(miner) to compute accessed_addresses_witness: Set[Address,EncodedWitnessTrieRoot] and include its merkel/verkel root in the block header. or we just want to make accessed_addresses 's trie (address=>true) 's root as the part of block header?

author: .vbuterin
content: Right now, the access list is just a transaction-level thing

author: .vbuterin
content: For Verkle trees, yeah the goal would be to compute a full access list and include some kind of hash of it in the block header
